content: this simple stocking ornament is based on the traditional granny square with some adaptations to one edge to make the boot/stocking shape i used dk yarn with a 5 5mm hook to keep them nice and loose for stuffing but you can use any hook and yarn combination you like this is great for beginners on the second page i ve included a chart with a key to symbols as well as brief instructions on how to make each stitch even if you re very new to crochet you shouldn t have any problems making this pattern these make great tree ornaments and you can pop a small chocolate or other confectionery inside too
